entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
